attributes.action: Ask the Queen to immediately dissolve this parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister and the government have renaged on their promises clearly stated in their last election manifesto. In doing so he they have gone against the wishes of a huge majority of the population.

This government, and the Prime Minister have shown complete disrespect for the people of this country who they represent, not rule.

Democracy must be protected by her Majesty at all times.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
